item.title: Agile personals ad
item.description: (In case you didn’t guess, this is a parody. Please dont send me emails!) Iâ€™m looking to find a fit and lean partner who can iterate rapidly on our relationship. The MVP for this partner is someone who can keep me entertained with user stories. Bonus point if the stories have a point (or several, as long as we keep to fibonacci numbers, which I have a strange fetish for).
